meanings.definition: The state or quality of being extended.
meanings.sent1: The extensionalities of the rubber band allowed it to stretch far.
meanings.sent2: The extensionalities of the project were beyond what we had anticipated.
meanings.sent3: The extensionalities of the slinky toy made it a fun and entertaining plaything.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had extensionalities that reached out to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The extensionalities of the bridge made it an impressive architectural feat.

meanings.definition: The range or scope of something.
meanings.sent1: The extensionalities of the forest seemed endless.
meanings.sent2: The extensionalities of the problem required a comprehensive solution.
meanings.sent3: The extensionalities of the buffet left everyone feeling satisfied and full.
meanings.sent4: His dreams had extensionalities that reached far beyond his current reality.
meanings.sent5: The extensionalities of the ocean filled her with a sense of wonder and awe.

meanings.definition: The act of extending or stretching out.
meanings.sent1: The extensionalities of the cat's stretch were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The extensionalities of the yoga pose helped improve flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The extensionalities of the dance move added flair to the performance.
meanings.sent4: His extensionalities in reaching out to others made him a great leader.
meanings.sent5: The extensionalities of the tree branches reached towards the sky.
